Verses.18: So Jesus was saying, "What is the Kingdom of God like? What shall I compare it to?
Verses.19: It is like a mustard seed. That someone took, and tossed into their garden. There it grew and became a tree where the birds of the air nested in its branches."
Verses.20: Again He said, "What shall I compare the Kingdom of God to?
Verses.21: It is like yeast that a woman took and working into three large measures of flour till it all was leavened."

InlineTitles.18: Parables of the Mustard Seed and Yeast

Changes: 2022-12-11 - Paul Prins: First translation of chapter 13:18-21.
